feed.title: Mohamed Reda TOUIL
feed.subtitle: Electronics • Robotics • AI for Medical Imaging

entry.title: 3D Liver Segmentation → Mixed-Reality Planning
entry.content:
End-to-end pipeline: preprocessing (NIfTI/DICOM), 3D U-Net / ResU-Net (PyTorch), Dice/SSIM monitoring, and real-time MR visualization for surgeons with correction workflow.

  • Datasets: LiTS2017, IRCAD, Task08 HepaticVessel
  • Tech: PyTorch, MONAI, CUDA, Unity (Meta Quest)

Code: https://github.com/Reda-TOUIL
entry.summary: End-to-end pipeline: preprocessing (NIfTI/DICOM), 3D U-Net / ResU-Net (PyTorch), Dice/SSIM monitoring, and real-time MR vi

entry.title: ArUco Marker Tracking on Jetson Nano
entry.content:
ROS node for camera-based detection and following of ArUco markers with GPU acceleration. Includes PID control and speed adaptation based on target distance.

  • Tech: ROS, OpenCV, CUDA, Python
  • HW: Jetson Nano, CSI camera

Repository: https://github.com/Reda-TOUIL
entry.summary: ROS node for camera-based detection and following of ArUco markers with GPU acceleration. Includes PID control and speed adaptation based

entry.title: Mobile Robot Perception for Eurobot 2025
entry.content:
Perception stack (object detection, mapping, decision signals) for a mobile robot competing at Eurobot France. Focus on robust vision & calibration.

Team artifacts: https://github.com/Reda-TOUIL
